import React, { useState, useContext } from 'react' import './mainTop.scss' import MainBtn from '../../UI/MainBtn/MainBtn' import UserMenu from './UserMenu/UserMenu' import UserModal from './UserModal/UserModal' import { Context } from '../../../context' const MainTop = () => { const [userModal, setUserModal] = useState(false) const { tabItems, darkMode, setDarkMode, setTaskModal, setAuthModal } = useContext(Context) const btnStyles = { padding: '10px 25px', background: '#29a19c', color: '#fafafa', columnGap: '10px', borderRadius: '8px', fontWeight: 600, fontSize: '16px', lineHeight: '22px', letterSpacing: '0.01em', visibility: tabItems.length ? 'visible' : 'hidden', } return (
setTaskModal(true)}> New task
{darkMode ? ( ) : ( )}
) } export default MainTop
